#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

#include<string.h>
int main()
{
    int n,i,j,count;
    cin>>n;
   getchar();
    char s[100000];
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
                    
                     count=1;
                    
                gets(s);
                
                for(j=0;j<strlen(s);j++)
                 if(s[j]==' ')
                count++;
   
                cout<<count<<endl;
}


}
